full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 31 of 228 707 LC2VMAX2 Rocchio - Direct 1 A. About 30 years now. 2 Q. As a clinical psychologist, what issues or areas do you specialize in? 3 4 A. I specialize primarily in the areas of traumatic stress and interpersonal violence. 5 6 Q. For how long have you focused on traumatic stress and interpersonal violence? 7 8 A. The same, about 30 years. 9 Q. In the course of your career, have you treated and evaluated individuals who have experienced or reported experiencing childhood sexual abuse? 10 11 12 A. Yes. 13 Q. Approximately how many victims of childhood sexual abuse have you evaluated and treated in the course of your career? 14 15 A. Hundreds upon hundreds. 16 Q. For how many years have you treated victims of childhood sexual abuse? 17 18 A. For the duration of my career; so since starting doing clinical work and graduate work, again, about 30 years ago. 19 20 Q. During the course of your career, how old are the patients that you have treated and evaluated who've experienced childhood sexual abuse? 21 22 23 A. So I worked beginning in my graduate training with teenagers, adolescents ages 12 and up, as well as adults. And 24 25 then in my private practice setting, I also worked with SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00017904
